content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Crude Oil Extraction Setup at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of a Pumpjack at position(17.5, 40.5)

#### Electricity Generator at position(-3.5, 2.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.5, 0.0)
- PipeGroup connecting the offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine at various positions
- Steam Engine at position(-3.5, 2.5)
- ElectricityGroup (power poles) connecting the steam engine to the pumpjack at various positions

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when placing Steam Engine
- Ensure the target location is not occupied by another entity or water before placing a steam engine.
- Check the terrain type before attempting to place a steam engine.

### NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
